review: I own two Chromecasts. For the price, you can't beat the usefulness and functionality. I can now stream my local and paid content to any TV in the house from any smartphone or tablet that happens to be nearest to me.The latest update to the Chromecast app on my smartphones also allows me to mirror my device's entire screen. So in the event that the app I'm using doesn't support Chromecasting, I can always just mirror my entire device.Another huge plus is CEC support. When casting from my phone, the Chromecast will actually automatically switch my TV's input to the right one, and will even turn the TV on if it isn't already on.I plan on having one of these in every room of the house. Best $35 I've ever spent.
